content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at position(-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

###Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at position(1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

###Smelting Array at position(1, 1)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (1, 1)
- Stone furnace at (3, 1)
- Stone furnace at (2, 7)
- Stone furnace at (4, 7)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for input/output

###Assembly Line Setup at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine for copper cable at (14.5, 14.5)
- Assembling machine for electronic circuits at (21.5, 15.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for material handling
- Transport belt system connecting components

###Power Generation System (In Progress)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Additional offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (18, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Extensive pipe network connecting components (multiple PipeGroups)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with pipe connections
- Ensure you have required items (pipes) in inventory before attempting to connect pipes
- Check if the connection points are valid and within reach
- Verify there are no obstacles between connection points

### Errors with entity placement
- Check if target position is clear before placing entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities that need to connect
- Verify the direction of placement matches the intended setup

### Power system errors
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine
- Check if all power-requiring entities are within electrical pole coverage
- Verify fuel supply for boilers

### Production line errors
- Ensure assembling machines have required resources in input
- Check if inserters are properly oriented for input/output
- Verify transport belt connections between production stages
